instructions:
New edition of a 13th Age character sheet with some automation.

If you find bugs or have suggestions, contact me via Roll20 PM or use the [Github issue tracker](https://github.com/neovatar/roll20-character-sheets/issues)

**Last changes:**
**Breaking changes:**
* NPC attributes use their own namespace to prevent future auto calculation errors (NPC values have to be added once more)

**More automation:**
* Player character hit points are auto calculated from base value, con mod and level multiplier
* Player character AC, PD and MD are now auto calculated (middle value + level bonus)

**Improvements:**
* Added item bonus fields to various stats

**Bugfixes:**
* fixed initiative roll macro
